title: People should buy these - Drop + EPOS H3X
description: Thanks to MANSCAPED for sponsoring the video! Get 20% OFF + Free Shipping at   Drop is back with another gaming headset and their new H3X which they created with EPOS looks like it could be a great option for gamers with a more limited budget. Does Adam think these are worth the money or should you buy a video game instead?  Buy a Drop + EPOS H3X:   Buy a EPOS GSX 1000 2nd Edition Gaming Amp:  Buy a HyperX Cloud II Gaming Headset:  Buy a Logitech Zone Vibe I00 Wireless Gaming Headset:  Buy a Logitech G733 Wireless Gaming Headset:  Buy a Corsair Void RGB Elite Wireless Gaming Headset:  Buy a Razer Nari Ultimate Wireless Gaming Headset:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something?
